Squizzy::

Her eyes opened and she sat up.  She looked Zardus. "What are your 
oders commander?" She then shook her head. Her last back up program 
started to run.  It uploaded all her training skills, engineering and 
bio-techno engineering knowledge.  She looked at Zardus 
again. "Whoah, what a head rush." She jumped off the table.  She 
stood 5 foot tall and had to crane her neck to look up at Zardus. "Hi 
there.  What do you need me to do?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Sorry if this seems like I'm speeding things, but this is kinda 
begining to 
> hold things up.
> 
> ::Zardus/DevilDuer::
> 
> Zardus smiles as the console reports the reprogramming being 
complete. 
> Squizzy (he got her name from her old proccessor) was programmed to 
be loyal 
> to him, and the other ussual precautions.
> 
> He flips a switch, the computer attempting to take her out of 
stasis lock.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer nods. "Yeah, might as well. Let's go!"
> 
> He walks into the base, motioning for her to follow.
